text1: A bar of soap lasts longer.
text2: This claim is false as this relies solely on usage, and the way you use it.

text1: Short hair can be just as easily be washed with a soap by just rubbing it over your hair.
text2: It is difficult to wash your hair with a bar of soap.

text1: A lot of soap does not sting in the eyes.
Shower gel can sting in your eyes too.
